title: Combine like terms
text: If the monomials are like terms, combine them by adding or subtracting the coefficient.
speech: If the monomials are like terms, combine them by adding or subtracting the coefficient.
pacedSpeech: If the monomials are like terms, combine them by adding or subtracting the coefficient.

title: Coefficients
text: $$2a^2$$ and $$-6a^2$$ are like terms so you may combine the coefficients. $$b^2$$ is not a like term.
speech: 2 a squared,  and , negative 6 a squared,  are like terms so you may combine the coefficients.  b squared  is not a like term.
pacedSpeech: are like terms so you may combine the coefficients.   b squared
